title: Executive Order 9020-Transferring Control of the Airport Near Tonopah, Nevada, to War Department
content: Under authority of section 2 (e) of the act of May 24, 1928, c. 728, 45 Stat. 728; 49 U.S.C. 212 (e), there is hereby transferred to the Secretary of War for military purposes, until otherwise ordered, full control of the airport on the lands described below, now leased, subject to the provisions of the said act, to the Board of County Commissioners of Nye County, Nevada:
T. 2 N., R. 44 E.,     Sec. 6, Lots 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, SE¼NW¼, E½SW¼     Sec. 7, Lot 1, NE¼NW¼
T. 3 N., R. 44 E.,     Sec. 31, Lots 2, 3, 4, E½SW¼, SE¼NW¼; containing 617.87 acres.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 9020-Transferring Control of the Airport Near Tonopah, Nevada, to War Department Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368019
